Nightlight:

"After I recover our bad experience in Hydras's blackfortress,=
 I woke up in the ark without a beast form... Your other self greeted me an=
d after I recovered a little i decided to have my old beast mode once again=
" said the femme"you left the medical chambers and  I started the process; =
while I was inside, you disappeared and reappear as dark Rodimus when I wok=
e up, Maximals told me what had happened with you"

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogrou=

mething

ud enough to

 I cant fill up

 creeps

> Oppressive is right. Even in RODIMUS' chamber it is=
 still somewhat
> dim. The lights brightened at his entrance, but the inter=
ior was still
> somehwat spartan and the walls were colored in a dark color=
ed paint. A
> desk and chair, a recharging chamber, a samll viewscreen and =
a control
> panel presumably hooked to the bases computer systems. There wa=
s a
> small work out center on one side where RODIMUS could presumably work=

> =
strength and endurance.

> In one corner there was a picture of ELITA and=
 NIGHTLIGHT it looked to
> be hand drawn, although in the picture it was li=
ke NIGHTLIGHT was
> before she got her current fuzor beastmode, something l=
ike how she was
> when she first escaped HYDRAS' clutches.

> That may al=
so remind NIGHTLIGHT of what she may have heard of the
> insectile creature=
s that RODIMUS mentioned. About how TUSCON and the
> others had to fight th=
eir way past them and escape out of the other
> side running back towards t=
he ARK. RODIMUS had nearly sacrificed his
> life at that point so that TUSC=
ON could escape HYDRAS' base and TUSCON
> had dragged him all the way back =
to be repaired. It was a thrilling
> time. It was around the time that RODI=
MUS seemed to have fought off
> the last of the dark taint that had been so=
 much a part of his spark
> and finally freed himself of being DARK RODIMUS=
!

> 
> DAR=
K RODIMUS turned to look at NIGHTLIGHT, "So, when did you get the

m?" He looked at her, examining her new frame and the changes

her robot mode. "It is very . . . becoming on you."
